level_of_abstraction.description: a thought that reflects upon the current state of abstraction

decomposition.description: at the given level of abstraction, decompose your full context into these fragments

understanding.description: a thought that captures the understanding of the context on the current level of abstraction

keywords.description: keywords that you now use directly to recall relevant knowledge from your memory

memory_update.description: on the current level of abstraction, update your knowledge by adding or modifying the memory

decrease.description: summarize the relevant context and repeat
